snippet: Charlie Sheen, he of the career rage, spousal assault charges and hotel-room rampage, stars in a new FX television series, “Anger Management,” that begins on June 28.
abstract: Charlie Sheen, who stars in a new FX television series, Anger Management, reflects on the past year, in which he was fired from his popular and lucrative role on Two and a Half Men and went on a public downfall of denial, drug use and crazy antics.
lead_paragraph: Charlie Sheen, he of the career rage, spousal assault charges and hotel-room rampage, stars in a new FX television series, “Anger Management,” that begins on June 28.

headline.seo: Charlie Sheen Stars in ‘Anger Management’ on FX
